title: Design-Based Research Approach for e-Learning Material Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A capacity-building course for current professionals in developing science-focused e-learning content.

learning_goals: Learners can derive learner needs and learning objectives through educational needs analysis.
Learners can produce e-learning storyboards and prototypes by applying a design-based research approach.
Learners can complete e-learning modules in the science domain through an expert collaboration process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
